intents.name: admission_process
trainingPhrases: How can I apply for admission?
What is the admission process?
How do I get admission?
Tell me the steps for admission.
responses: To apply for admission, fill out the online application form on our website, submit the required documents, and pay the application fee. Would you like the application link?

intents.name: course_details
trainingPhrases: What courses are available?
Do you offer engineering courses?
Which programs do you have?
Tell me about the courses.
responses: We offer various undergraduate and postgraduate courses, including B.Tech, MBA, BBA, and more. Would you like a course brochure?

intents.name: fee_structure
trainingPhrases: What is the fee for B.Tech?
How much does MBA cost?
Tell me the fee details.
What are the tuition fees?
responses: The tuition fee for B.Tech is approximately ₹1,00,000 per year. Fees may vary based on scholarships. Would you like details on scholarships or installment options?

intents.name: scholarship_info
trainingPhrases: Are there any scholarships?
Do you provide financial aid?
What are the eligibility criteria for scholarships?
responses: Yes, we offer merit-based and need-based scholarships. Eligibility depends on academic performance and entrance exam scores. Do you want to apply?

intents.name: placement_info
trainingPhrases: What are the placement opportunities?
Do you have campus placements?
Which companies visit for placements?
responses: We have a strong placement cell with recruiters like TCS, Infosys, and Wipro. The average package is ₹6 LPA. Would you like the placement report?

intents.name: hostel_accommodation
trainingPhrases: Do you provide hostel facilities?
What are the hostel charges?
Tell me about the hostel rooms.
responses: Yes, we provide hostel facilities with modern amenities. The annual fee ranges from ₹50,000 to ₹80,000. Would you like a virtual tour?

intents.name: internship_info
trainingPhrases: Do you provide internships?
Are there any internship opportunities?
How can I apply for an internship?
responses: We offer internship programs in collaboration with top companies. Students can apply after the second year. Do you want details on companies offering internships?

intents.name: entrance_exam
trainingPhrases: Do I need to give an entrance exam?
Which exams are accepted for admission?
What are the cutoff scores?
responses: We accept entrance exams like JEE, CAT, and our internal test. Required scores vary by course. Do you need preparation tips?

intents.name: admission_deadlines
trainingPhrases: What is the last date to apply?
When is the admission deadline?
Tell me about the admission timeline.
responses: The last date to apply for admissions is June 30. Make sure to complete your application before the deadline. Do you need help with the application process?

intents.name: contact_info
trainingPhrases: How can I contact the admission office?
What is the college's email ID?
Give me the contact details.
responses: You can contact our admission office at admissions@college.edu or call +91-XXXXXXXXXX. Would you like to schedule a call?

intents.name: campus_facilities
trainingPhrases: What facilities does the college have?
Is there a library on campus?
Tell me about the campus infrastructure.
responses: Our campus has modern classrooms, a library, sports facilities, labs, and a cafeteria. Would you like a campus tour?

intents.name: exam_results
trainingPhrases: When will the semester exams start?
How can I check my results?
Tell me about the exam schedule.
responses: Semester exams usually start in December and May. You can check your results on the student portal. Do you need login help?

intents.name: events_workshops
trainingPhrases: Are there any upcoming events?
Do you have any workshops on AI?
Tell me about college events.
responses: Yes! We have a tech fest and an AI workshop next month. Would you like to register?

intents.name: library_timings
trainingPhrases: What are the library timings?
Is the library open on weekends?
Tell me the working hours of the library.
responses: The library is open from 7 AM to 5 PM on weekdays and 9 AM to 4 PM on weekends. Do you need assistance with book reservations?

intents.name: transfer_students_acceptance
trainingPhrases: Do you accept transfer students?
Can I transfer from another university?
What are the requirements for transfer students?
responses: Yes, we accept transfer students. You need to provide previous transcripts and meet the eligibility criteria. Would you like more details?

intents.name: sports_facilities
trainingPhrases: What sports facilities are available?
Does the college have a gym?
Are there any sports teams in college?
responses: Our college has a gym, football field, basketball court, and indoor sports facilities. Would you like to join a sports club?

intents.name: online_courses
trainingPhrases: Do you offer online courses?
Can I take classes online?
What online learning options are available?
responses: Yes, we offer online courses in various subjects. You can check the online learning portal for details. Would you like the course list?

intents.name: student_population
trainingPhrases: How many students attend this college?
What is the student population?
How big is the student body?
responses: Our college has around 10,000 students enrolled across various programs. Would you like details on specific departments?

intents.name: average_class_size
trainingPhrases: What is the average class size?
How many students are in each class?
Are class sizes small or large?
responses: The average class size is about 30 students, ensuring personalized attention. Do you want details on specific courses?

intents.name: competitions
trainingPhrases: Are there any competitions for students?
What kind of contests does the college have?
Tell me about academic and sports competitions.
responses: We organize various academic, sports, and technical competitions. You can check the student portal for upcoming contests. Do you need more details?

intents.name: cultural_events
trainingPhrases: Are there any cultural events in college?
What are the upcoming cultural fests?
Tell me about college fests.
responses: Yes, our college hosts cultural fests, dance competitions, and music nights. Would you like to participate in an event?

intents.name: industrial_visits
trainingPhrases: Do you organize industrial visits?
Are there any company visits for students?
Tell me about industry exposure programs.
responses: Yes, we arrange industrial visits for students to gain real-world experience. Upcoming visits are announced in the student portal. Would you like to register?

intents.name: picnic
trainingPhrases: Does the college organize picnics?
Are there any trips or outings for students?
Tell me about student trips.
responses: Yes, the college organizes trips and picnics for students to relax and socialize. Upcoming events are updated on the college website. Would you like to know more?

intents.name: practical_labs
trainingPhrases: What are the lab facilities available?
Are there science labs in college?
Tell me about the practical labs.
responses: Our college has well-equipped physics, chemistry, and computer labs for practical learning. Would you like details on lab timings?

intents.name: semester_end_exam
trainingPhrases: When are the semester exams held?
What is the schedule for term-end exams?
Tell me about the final exams.
responses: Semester-end exams are conducted in December and May. The exact schedule is available on the student portal. Do you need help accessing it?

intents.name: bridge_courses
trainingPhrases: Are there any bridge courses available before the semester starts?
Do you offer preparatory courses before the main semester?
Can I take a refresher course before my classes begin?
responses: Yes, we offer bridge courses in subjects like Math, English, and Programming to help students prepare before the semester starts.

intents.name: change_major
trainingPhrases: How do I change my major or course?
Can I switch my major after admission?
What is the process to change my course?
responses: To change your major or course, you need to submit a request to the academic office. The approval depends on course availability and eligibility criteria.

intents.name: hostel_mandatory
trainingPhrases: Is hostel accommodation mandatory for first-year students?
Do first-year students have to stay in the hostel?
Can I stay outside the college during my first year?
responses: Hostel accommodation is optional for first-year students, but highly recommended for convenience and safety.

intents.name: hostel_rules
trainingPhrases: What are the hostel rules and regulations?
Tell me about the hostel guidelines.
What rules do I need to follow in the hostel?
responses: The hostel has rules regarding curfew timings, guest policies, and cleanliness. A detailed rulebook is provided upon admission.

intents.name: installment_plans
trainingPhrases: Are there any installment plans for tuition fees?
Can I pay my fees in parts?
Is there a flexible payment option for tuition?
responses: Yes, we offer installment plans for tuition fees. You can contact the finance office for details on payment options.

intents.name: part_time_classes
trainingPhrases: Are there any part-time or evening classes?
Does the college offer night classes?
Can I take classes in the evening?
responses: Yes, we offer part-time and evening classes for select courses. Please check with the administration office for course availability.

intents.name: refund_policy
trainingPhrases: What is the refund policy for tuition fees?
Can I get a refund if I withdraw from the college?
How does the tuition refund process work?
responses: The refund policy varies based on the time of withdrawal. Please refer to the official college guidelines or contact the finance office for details.

intents.name: popular_courses
trainingPhrases: What are the most popular courses at this college?
Which courses are most in demand?
What are the best programs offered here?
responses: Our most popular courses include Computer Science, Business Administration, Mechanical Engineering, and Psychology. Let me know if you need details on any specific course!
